title: How do I attach a signature to an SMS message?
answer: Go to Messaging > Menu > Settings > General, turn on Attach signature, and follow the onscreen instructions to set up a signature. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140397)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140398) []()![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140399) The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
